item.title: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway has big message for homebuyers
item.description: The billionaire investor's real estate company makes a key statement.

item.title: Walmart is selling a $1,100 electric bike for $648 that's 'built like a tank'
item.description: "It packs a punch with its 1,500-watt battery and will get you anywhere around town you need to go."

item.title: Tesla's record-breaking quarter isn't enough for investors

item.title: Walmart is selling a giant skeleton for only $238, and it's a must-have for Halloween
item.description: It's one of the most affordable giant skeletons we've seen.

item.title: Forget VOO, SPY, VTI: Best stock investing pick is this Fidelity fund
item.description: It's better than ETFs from Vanguard, iShares, and State Street for this reason.
